issue.title: Indoor navigation & order
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

With the ability of the map to offer indoor navigation, it would be interesting to propose indoor navigation for perimeter selection in the basket.

*Description :*
The indoor navigation activation is drove by the map : if the "indoor navigation tool" is activated on the map used by the basket (for order perimeter definition), then current level set on this map will be saved as an order information.






**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC OK
